channel.title: [Release] Rune-Evolution v2
channel.description:
It's been a long time since I've released anything other than version one of this, so I'm posting this now. Yep. This just happened. It has all of the features of the previous release plus a few minor tweaks and a few new additions. [b]Server has MySQL implemented, and requires it to load NPC Spawns, Item Prices, Object Spawns, and includes the Vote Database. [/b]
First Release: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,600005.0.html]Click Here[/url]
[ul][li]No more exploits, still no dupes[/li] [li]New Skiller shop with a load of stuff[/li] [li]Easy to run with little editing[/li] [li]Download Includes Client, Cache, Server, and a few Extras[/li] [li]More organized Portal tab with more options[/li] [li]Has over 90+ achievements 100% working[/li] [li]Another new completely custom made home area[/li] [li]Plus a lot more stuff![/li][/ul]
Source Package.zip (545.5 MB) [url=https://mega.co.nz/#!0ZgVjRKZ!OvcBIgIgYeCHUBg3aWAq4yzQBFJMgGntpBDTaSISaLA]Download Now[/url]
[b]ScreenShots Folder[/b]: [url=https://www.dropbox.com/sh/iyuiuhet5fkm5ij/5H0jHqTKOH/742screens]Click Here[/url]
Basic Setup Instruction:
[ul][li]Make sure you have the database files imported[/li] [li]Re-Enable SQL connection via DatabasePool.java[/li] [li]Edit Database creditials in Server.java[/li] [li]Edit the name in Settings.java to make yourself owner[/li] [li]Run the server, then Client, have fun & enjoy.[/li][/ul] Please do not send me PM's requesting help for anything at all. I get 5+ PM's daily from the first release still and it's pretty annoying. If you're new to coding i suggest you don't use 718 or make use of the help section :L

item.title: [Release] Rune-Evolution v2
item.dc:creator: @aznchris aznchris
item.description:
@aznchris wrote:

I edited everything to my information, but I can’t seem to fix this Exception 19 error. If anyone could help, that would be great. Thanks

[Launcher] Loading SolariScape, please wait... [DatabasePool] Connected to MySql Database. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 19 at com.rs.utils.Utils.getItemDefinitionsSize(Utils.java:329) at com.rs.cache.loaders.ItemsEquipIds.init(ItemsEquipIds.java:13) at com.rs.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:72) Press any key to continue . . .

Edit: I found the error, but I don’t know what number to input. Could someone help me please? Thanks

Edit2: Ahh nvm. I got it. I feel kinda nub lol.The source was just missing the Cache files.

Read full topic

item.title: [Release] Rune-Evolution v2
item.dc:creator: @Koochi_Cut Koochi Cut
item.description:
@Koochi_Cut wrote:

Mysql support, yes! I hope you expand upon this.

One small thing: when opening any shop there is lag when the sql server is queried, is it not making cache a copy in ram somewhere?

highscores.sql was not included, here it is:

[code]/*
MySQL Data Transfer
Source Host: 192.168.2.8
Source Database: rs
Target Host: 192.168.2.8
Target Database: rs
Date: 10/8/2013 4:27:51 AM
*/

SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS=0;

– Table structure for highscores

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS highscores;
CREATE TABLE highscores (
name varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT ‘’,
overall int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
rights int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
totalxp varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
prestige int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
combatLvl int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
Attack varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
Attack_xp int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
Defence varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
Defence_xp int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
Strength varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
Strength_xp int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
Constitution varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
Constitution_xp int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
Ranged varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
Ranged_xp int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
Prayer varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
Prayer_xp int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
Magic varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
Magic_xp int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
Cooking varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
Cooking_xp int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
Woodcutting varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
Woodcutting_xp int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
Fletching varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
Fletching_xp int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
Fishing varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
Fishing_xp int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
Firemaking varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
Firemaking_xp int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
Crafting varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
Crafting_xp int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
Smithing varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
Smithing_xp int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
Mining varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
Mining_xp int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
Herblore varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
Herblore_xp int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
Agility varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
Agility_xp int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
Thieving varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
Thieving_xp int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
Slayer varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
Slayer_xp int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
Farming varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
Farming_xp int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
Runecrafting varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
Runecrafting_xp int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
Hunter varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
Hunter_xp int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
Construction varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
Construction_xp int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
Summoning varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
Summoning_xp int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
Dungeoneering varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
Dungeoneering_xp int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
PRIMARY KEY (name)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

– Records

[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [Release] Rune-Evolution v2
item.dc:creator: @Master_claw Master claw
item.description:
@Master_claw wrote:

For everyone that cant figure out how to make your self owner:

Server sided
Go in settings.java (change king_fox to your name)
Compile settings.java
run server

Ingame
Do ;;setrights (rights=1-6) (name)
It is as simble as that.

Np for those i help

Also if anyone knows how to make the mysol work so the npcs will spawn. Please tell me

Read full topic
